ByrdPetCall.NAME: Byrd
ByrdPetCall.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Byrd. NL It has 3 damages and !M! Mana.
ByrdPetCall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon a Byrd. NL It has 4 damages and !M! Mana.

CultistPetCall.NAME: Cultist
CultistPetCall.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Cultist. NL It has 4 damages and !M! Mana.
CultistPetCall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon a Cultist. NL It has 6 damages and !M! Mana.

GremlinNobPetCall.NAME: GremlinNob Call
GremlinNobPetCall.DESCRIPTION: Call a GremlinNob. NL It has 4 damages and !M! Mana. NL Exhaust.
GremlinNobPetCall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Call a GremlinNob. NL It has 6 damages and !M! Mana. NL Exhaust.

GremlinTsunderePetCall.NAME: GremlinTsundere
GremlinTsunderePetCall.DESCRIPTION: Summon a GremlinTsundere. NL It has !M! Mana and can give you 6 Block. NL Exhaust.
GremlinTsunderePetCall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon a GremlinTsundere with a random DeathRattle. NL It has !M! Mana and can give you 6 Block. NL Exhaust.

HealerPetCall.NAME: Healer
HealerPetCall.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Healer. NL It has !M! Mana and can heal you 6 HP. NL Exhaust.
HealerPetCall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon a Healer with a random DeathRattle. NL It has !M! Mana and can heal you 6 HP. NL Exhaust.

PetCapture.NAME: Capture
PetCapture.DESCRIPTION: Capture a monster if the monster's life is less than 8 or 20%.NL if it failed that take !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

LeftHookFist.NAME: LeftHook Fist
LeftHookFist.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Apply a Combo.

EagleSecond.NAME: Shoot-2
EagleSecond.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Combo-2: Increase !M! damage.

EagleThird.NAME: Shoot-3
EagleThird.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Combo-3: Increase !M! damage.

Combo Connect.NAME: Continue Shoot-N
Combo Connect.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Combo-N: Gain [R] and draw a card.

SnakeForm.NAME: Snake Form
SnakeForm.DESCRIPTION: Get confusion. NL Draw !M! card each turn.
SnakeForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Get confusion. NL Draw !M! card each turn.

Heal Wind.NAME: Heal Wind
Heal Wind.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all non-Attack cards in your hand. Gain !M! HP for each card Exhausted.

Giant Prayer.NAME: Prayer
Giant Prayer.DESCRIPTION: Add a random card into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

Blood Attack.NAME: BloodAttack
Blood Attack.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle a Blood into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

One Blood.NAME: One Blood
One Blood.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block( !M! times your lost HP). NL Lose HP to 1. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next 4 turn. NL Exhaust.

Recover HP.NAME: Recover
Recover HP.DESCRIPTION: At the end of 3 turns, recover your lost HP in this turns.

First Combo.NAME: FirstCombo-1
First Combo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Combo. NL Exhaust.

Infinite Combo.NAME: Infinite Combo
Infinite Combo.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a FirstCombo into your hand.
Infinite Combo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add a FirstCombo into your hand.

Seek Combo.NAME: Seek Combo
Seek Combo.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile. NL Choose a Combo from your draw pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
Seek Combo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile. NL Choose a Combo from your draw pile into your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: There are no Combos NL in my draw pile.

Retain Combo.NAME: Retain Combo
Retain Combo.DESCRIPTION: At the end of turn, retain your combos in your hand.

Unlimited Combo.NAME: Unlimited Combo
Unlimited Combo.DESCRIPTION: Your combo card can trigger without other condition in this turn.
Unlimited Combo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your combo card can trigger without other condition in this and next turn.

Discover Combo.NAME: Discover Combo
Discover Combo.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random Combo cards to add into your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
Discover Combo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random Combo cards to add into your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

Discover Pet.NAME: Discover Minions
Discover Pet.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random Minion cards to add into your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
Discover Pet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random Minion cards to add into your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

Double Mana.NAME: Nourish
Double Mana.DESCRIPTION: Double the minion's health and Mana. NL Exhaust.
Double Mana.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Triple the minion's health and Mana. NL Exhaust.

Up Up Up.NAME: UP UP UP
Up Up Up.DESCRIPTION: Increase !M! Strength and Mana to a pet. NL Exhaust. NL Echo.

Death Explode.NAME: Death Explode
Death Explode.DESCRIPTION: Decrease a Minions's Mana to 1 and give DeathRattle: Explode !M! times.

Sacrifice Summons.NAME: Sacrifice Minions
Sacrifice Summons.DESCRIPTION: Immolate all Minions. NL each immolate Minion get a 0 cost Minion Card.
Sacrifice Summons.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Immolate all Minions. NL each immolate Minion get a 0 cost and upgraded Minion Card.

Time Travel.NAME: Time Travel
Time Travel.DESCRIPTION: Mark your HP, at the end of battle, recover HP to the mark number.

Revenge Attack.NAME: Revenge
Revenge Attack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The damage is 12 plus your received damage this combat.

Blood Defend.NAME: Blood Defend
Blood Defend.DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 HP, NL Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle a Blood into your draw pile. NL Echo.

Duplicate Hand.NAME: Duplicate Hand
Duplicate Hand.DESCRIPTION: Copy your hand cards to draw pile. NL Exhuast.
Duplicate Hand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Copy your hand cards to draw pile.

Mana Growth.NAME: Mana Growth
Mana Growth.DESCRIPTION: Gian !B! Block. NL Your Minions gain !M! Mana.

Combo Form.NAME: Combo Form
Combo Form.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain combo-1.
Combo Form.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, gain combo-1.

Pummel Giant.NAME: Pummel-2
Pummel Giant.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Combo-2: Increase 2 times.

Beast Master.NAME: Beast Master
Beast Master.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, lose !M! HP, gain !M! Spirit.

Bloody Giant.NAME: Bloody
Bloody Giant.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 2 Blood into your draw pile. Whenever you draw a Blood card, draw !M! card, gain !M! Strength, heal 3 HP.
Bloody Giant.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 2 Blood into your draw pile. Whenever you draw a Blood card, draw !M! cards, gain !M! Strength, heal 3 HP.

Combo Recycle.NAME: Combo Recycle-N
Combo Recycle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Combo-N: Gain [R] [R] and draw 1 card.

Backward Giant.NAME: Backward-3
Backward Giant.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Combo-3: Increase !M! Block and Blocks will not disappear in 2 turn.

Fanatic Cultist.NAME: Fanatic
Fanatic Cultist.DESCRIPTION: Your Cultists gain !M! Strength but reduce 2 Mana. NL Exhaust.
Fanatic Cultist.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your Cultists gain !M! Strength but reduce 2 Mana.

Seek Pet.NAME: Seek Minion
Seek Pet.DESCRIPTION: Choose a Minion from your draw pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
Seek Pet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Choose two Minions from your draw pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: There are no Minions NL in my draw pile.

Rupture Giant.NAME: Rupture
Rupture Giant.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP from a card, NL gain 1 Strength.

Meditate Giant.NAME: Meditate-4
Meditate Giant.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw a card. NL Combo-4: Gain [R] [R] and draw more !M! cards.
Meditate Giant.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw a card. NL Combo-4: Gain [R] [R] [R] and draw more !M! cards.

The End Giant.NAME: The End-5
The End Giant.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice to all enemies. NL Combo-5: Gain !B! block. Increase !M! damage.

Struggle Attack.NAME: Struggle Attack
Struggle Attack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage(your lost HP plus 5, Max 50). NL Shuffle a Blood into your draw pile.

Storm Of Blood.NAME: Storm of Blood
Storm Of Blood.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Add 1 BloodAttack into your hand for each card discarded.
Storm Of Blood.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Add 1 upgraded BloodAttack into your hand for each card discarded.

Cooperation Attack.NAME: Cooperation
Cooperation Attack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have Minions, apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable.

DefectPetCall.NAME: Broken Defect
DefectPetCall.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Defect. NL It has 6 damages to all enemies and !M! Mana.
DefectPetCall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon a Defect. NL It has 8 damages to all enemies and !M! Mana.

SpikerPetCall.NAME: Spiker
SpikerPetCall.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Taunt Spiker. NL It has !M! Mana and 3 throns. NL Exhaust.
SpikerPetCall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon a Taunt Spiker with a random DeathRattle. NL It has !M! Mana and 3 throns. NL Exhaust.

Hunter Bow.NAME: Bow
Hunter Bow.DESCRIPTION: Equip a Bow with 2 Arrow and 4 damage. NL Add !M! Bow's relevant cards to your hand.
Hunter Bow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Equip a Bow with 2 Arrow and 4 damage. NL Add !M! Bow's relevant and upgraded cards to your hand.

Weapon Upgrade.NAME: Upgrade
Weapon Upgrade.DESCRIPTION: Increase !M! damage to the Bow. NL Add a same card into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

Calmness Giant.NAME: Calmness
Calmness Giant.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Skill and 0 cost card, draw !M! card.
